attributes.action: Put an age limit on Facebook!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The computer never used to be a place where parents would have to worry about what their children are doing. Even though they are at home it doesn’t mean to say that they are safe. More and more stories have come to our attention over the past few years of young people getting killed; paedophilia and abuse over the internet (possibly leading to suicide). This never used to be a problem but now it is all thanks to social networking websites such as - ‘Facebook’; ‘MySpace’; ‘Bebo’ etc. What I ask is that there should be some sort of an age limit to these sites, so that the younger more vulnerable ages can stay clear of these sorts of dangers. I think that young people have enough things to be concerned about other then worrying about problems they are having with individuals over the internet! 

Below are just a few links to illustrate my point.

http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-1224130/Mother-Ashleigh-Hall-killed-meeting-man-Facebook-calls-ban-false-online-profiles.html

http://www.msnbc.msn.com/id/21844203/

http://www.digitaljournal.com/article/256115

Please help stop this before it goes much further.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
